Description: # README
        
        ## What Is This Repository For?
        This repo is boilerplate code for creating python cli packages that can be easily be rolled up into single file executable binaries.
        
        The binaries can be created with Python Pex or with PyInstaller. Once created, you can deploy the single file executable binaries into your containers/vms simply by copying the file. No dependencies to track
        
        Configuration management tools, like: Salt, Puppet, Chef, and Ansible can pull down the executable binaries from any acceptable datastore (AWS S3 for example) and call them as part of your DevOps system. 
        
        ## Basic Usage
        
        first, setup the virtualenv
        ```
        #!bash
        $ bash initialize.sh
        ```
        
        
        
        Learn more 
        
        https://github.com/pantsbuild/pex
        
        https://github.com/pyinstaller/pyinstaller
        
        http://www.kennethreitz.org/essays/repository-structure-and-python
        
Platform: UNKNOWN
info.name: rambo-vagrant
